contentrichtext.text: {{Unreferenced|date=June 2008}} '''Virginópolis''' is a [[Brazil]]ian city in the state of [[Minas Gerais]]. As of 2004 its population is estimated to be 10,180. The city celebrates every year, in the end of October and beginning of November, its "Festival of [[Jabuticaba]]". It's a king of very delicious and rare fruit that grows in the region. It's also the way the city found to have all the "Virginopolitanos" living abroad, meeting each other. {{coord|18|45|S|42|45|W|region:BR_type:city|display=title}} [[Category:Populated places in Minas Gerais]] {{MinasGerais-geo-stub}}
